Method Detail

get

public void get(java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.Integer imageLimit,
                ResponseListener listener)
Fetches user information from ImageShack and returns UserModel. If username is null, then returns the UserModel of the authenticated user.

Parameters:
username - the username of user to fetch
imageLimit - the image limit for latest images, optional
listener - the response listener that is notified when async http request is completed

update

public void update(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String email,
                   java.lang.String newUsername,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   java.lang.String firstName,
                   java.lang.String lastName,
                   java.lang.String gender,
                   java.lang.String location,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   java.lang.String avatarServer,
                   java.lang.String avatarFilename,
                   ResponseListener listener)
Update user

Parameters:
username - the current username, optional
email - new email, optional
newUsername - new username, optional
password - new password, optional
firstName - new first name, optional
lastName - new last name, optional
gender - new gender, optional
location - new location, optional
description - new description, optional
avatarServer - new avatar server, optional
avatarFilename - new avatar filename, optional
listener - the listener for async http response

listener - the listener for async http response

listener - the listener for async http response

updateSettings

public void updateSettings(java.lang.Boolean isPrivateDefaultImages,
                           java.lang.Boolean isPrivateDefaultAlbums,
                           java.lang.Boolean isFollowingAllowed,
                           java.lang.Boolean enabledUploadNotifications,
                           java.lang.Boolean enableCommentsNotifications,
                           java.lang.Boolean enableLikesNotifications,
                           java.lang.Boolean enableFollowingNotifications,
                           ResponseListener listener)
Update user settings

Parameters:
isPrivateDefaultImages - make new images private by default
isPrivateDefaultAlbums - make new albums private by default
isFollowingAllowed - opt out of following feature
enabledUploadNotifications - enable/disable new uploads email notifications
enableCommentsNotifications - enable/disable comments email notifications
enableLikesNotifications - enable/disable likes email notifications
enableFollowingNotifications - enable/disable new followers email notifications
listener -
